metadata.description: Pilot Season Begins Anew as a 6 Week Event in 2010! Finding that someone special in the modern age isn't easy; but online dating sites promise matches based on multi-faceted personality profiles. So what happens when you meet the woman of your dreams but she turns out to be more than what she seems? Madeline would be the perfect girlfriend if it wasn't for the fact that she's trying to get Doug killed. Created and written by Top Cow Publisher Filip Sablik (Black Diamond) and debuting up-and-coming artist David Marquez (Syndrome) along with a cover by Jenny Frison (Angel), The Asset redefines the femme fatale for the digital age.
metadata.name: Pilot Season 2010
